entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few wet flurries and rain showers overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:19 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few wet flurries and rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 8:19 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:19 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
